content.p: Earn money and boost your CV. Unitemps helps you find part-time and temporary work that fits around your studies. Whether you're looking for a role in hospitality, get paid to support an open day event, administration or a specialist position, Unitemps may have a vacancy that is suitable for you. Applications are all online and requre a tailored cover letter and CV. Unitemps is experienced in helping international students with visa restrictions and can advise on suitable opportunities. Apply for a role More about part-time and vacation work Based in the Portland Building on University Park, Unitemps is part of the University's Careers and Employability Service. Visit the Unitemps website to upload your CV and apply for roles that suit your skills and experience.
